hero.title: About Ketchup
hero.subtitle: We're revolutionizing content creation and distribution through the power of AI and human creativity.

mission.title: Our Mission
mission.description: To democratize content creation and empower creators worldwide with cutting-edge AI technology, enabling them to reach global audiences and build sustainable careers.

creativity.title: Creativity First
creativity.desc: We believe in the power of human creativity enhanced by AI.

team.title: Meet Our Team
team.subtitle: A diverse group of innovators, creators, and technologists passionate about the future of content.

ceo.bio: Former Google AI researcher with 10+ years in content creation and distribution.

cto.bio: Expert in AI/ML with experience building scalable content platforms.

cpo.bio: Creative director with deep understanding of creator economy and brand partnerships.

innovation.title: Innovation
innovation.desc: Pushing boundaries in AI and content creation.

creativity.title: Creativity
creativity.desc: Fostering artistic expression and unique content.

excellence.title: Excellence
excellence.desc: Delivering the highest quality in everything we do.

cta.title: Join Our Mission
cta.subtitle: Whether you're a creator looking to grow or a brand ready to innovate, we're here to help you succeed.
